exoplanet | case studies

exoplanet is a toolkit for probabilistic modeling of transit and/or radial velocity observations of exoplanets and other astronomical time series using PyMC3.

The main documentation page for exoplanet can be found at docs.exoplanet.codes, but this page includes several case studies that are examples of fully fledged analyses that are somewhat more computationally expensive to run than the tutorials included in the main repository.
